Proxy.name: VisItSiloReaderCore

Documentation.long_help: Reads Silo rectilinear, curvilinear, unstructured, or point meshes

Proxy.Documentation: Note this reader is automatically generated from wrapping a third party reader. For more information on the reader see https://wci.llnl.gov/codes/visit The default file extension is .silo
